answers.answer: You check you blood pressure regularly and make sure that it is NEVER running high.  You also get a test for diabetes FAST!  If you are positive you cut sugar out of your diet and limit your carbohydrates drastically.  Check your blood sugars before meals and at bedtime and drink plenty of water and stay away from medications that are cleared through your kidneys.  Moderate exercise is also recommended.

question: what do you do if you have high microalbumin? change in diet, medicine?
title: What is microalbumin?
